sentence.Network_en: A stand-in drummer bashes on a single snare and a pair of cymbals.
sentence.Network_cn: 一名临时顶替的鼓手使劲敲着一根响弦和一对铙钹。

sentence.Network_en: " I think I've done a good deal ,'said the drummer, looking around.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我看我做的不算少了."推销员说着看了看四周.

sentence.Network_en: The drummer was feeling the shadow of something which was coming.
sentence.Network_cn: 推销员感到了要发生什么事的阴影.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from the verb drum + -er; sense 2 from drum up

entry.def: A drummer is a person who plays a drum or drums in a band or group.
